app_name: Groups Control Groups Messenger Apps Kik Messaging Chat App
app_description: Get connected. Kik is way more than just messaging. It s the easiest way to connect with your friends stay in the loop and explore all through chat. No phone numbers just pick a username. Choose who to chat with one on one and in groups Share pics videos gifs games and more Meet new friends with similar interests Get on Kik now. Start chatting!
